Scatter is the first product from Spiral Content, a new digital marketing company. With 40 years of experience across firms like Network18, Blackstone and BBC, we are well placed to realise our dream of creating exceptional content platforms to connect the best publishers and brands.

From former media executives, to fresh graduates, we have a team that is both experienced and diverse. Brought together by a shared love of digital marketing, our dream is to revolutionise content by creating beautiful, innovative products.
